name: Little one (itch) (Asue)
description:
Hello everyone :)

Little one is a 2D game made for the Ludum Dare 45 in 72 hours. The theme was "Start with nothing".

Inspired by the Spore game, you play as a microorganism that must survive in a hostile world.

Maybe you should try to unlock all the available improvements.

Controls

-> Move the character with the mouse

-> Press escape to open the skill panel or change the music volume

Team

-> Asue as a game developer

-> impact composed one of the game's music

-> Oxalotte also composed one of the game's music

Credits

-> Dynamic Space Background Lite by Dinv Studio
